sentences.sContent: The rash morphology progresses from papules to pustules and finally to crusting lesions.
sentences.sContent_eng: The rash morphology progresses from papules to pustules and finally to crusting lesions.
sentences.sCn: 皮疹的形态从最初的丘疹发展至脓疱，最终局部脱屑。

sentences.sContent: In fact, a major theme in research here is how the morphology of the bird influences its behavior.
sentences.sContent_eng: In fact, a major theme in research here is how the morphology of the bird influences its behavior.
sentences.sCn: 实际上，探寻鸟类形态如何影响它的行为是该实验室的主要研究课题。

sentences.sContent: In fact, a major theme in research here is how the morphology of the bird influences its behavior.
sentences.sContent_eng: In fact, a major theme in research here is how the morphology of the bird influences its behavior.
sentences.sCn: 事实上，该实验室研究的一个主要方向是鸟儿的形态是如何影响它们的动作的。

synos.tran: [晶体][生物]形态学，形态论；[语]词法，词态学

phrases.pCn: [晶]晶体形态学；形态结晶学；晶体结构

words.tran: 在屏幕上变换图像；改变

trans.tranCn: 形态学(尤指动植物形态学或词语形态学)
trans.tranOther: the study of the  morpheme s  of a language and of the way in which they are joined together to make words
